satlas.style.set¶

satlas.style.set(style='standard')[source]¶

Sets the current style to a SATLAS style. For a list of available styles, use get_available_styles.

Parameters:style (str or list) –

Style sheets specification. Valid options are:

str The name of a SATLAS style.
list A list of style specifiers (str) applied from first to last in the list.

Previous topic

satlas.utilities.utilities.dopplerfactor

Next topic

satlas.style.get_available_styles
